text: And there's the picture. Boy's throwing off a stool. Lid is throwing off the cookie jar. He's grabbing a cookie in his hand. The girl is reaching up. She's touching her nose. I'll take care of it on that side. Other side. Mother is washing dishes. I think they're running over. Her beak's getting wet. She's looking out the window. I think her dip better look out of the window. Her beak's getting wet at the same time. That's why it looks. Okay. Okay?
